name: Airborne: The Beginning
description:
BECOME AIRBORNE

Airborne takes you to the skies in this first-person shooter experience. Control your movement in-air with your jetpack while you shoot drones out of the skies. Explore multiple gorgeous environments and take out as many targets as possible in the shortest amount of time and top the leaderboards.

DEFEND EARTHThe Krax have sent their evil bots to invade and plunder earth of its natural resources and our planes, helicopters and missiles stand no chance against the small and agile flying bots.

KEY FEATURES

  • Control your movement in-air with your thruster
  • Shoot drones
  • Explore varied landscapes with unique themes and soundtracks
  • Top the leaderboards

Note: This product is currently in EARLY ACCESS and we will continue to update the game with new content, features, improvements, and bug fixes based on your feedback. Thank you for your support!

Our demo is completely FREE to try, if you'd like to try it before purchasing.

Join our discord: https://discord.com/invite/wXv8PE9M3H
